alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Northwestern Nye County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 7:07PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Isolated afternoon showers and thunderstorms Thursday with gusty winds... An approaching weather system will bring increasing cloud cover and gusty southwest winds to the region Thursday. In addition, showers and isolated thunderstorms are expected to develop late Thursday morning into the afternoon hours from northwest Nye county, Lander and Eureka counties into Elko county. Gusty and erratic outflow winds along with little rain are expected from these showers and thunderstorms. Prepare and secure outdoor objects that could be impacted by these gusty winds. Showers and thunderstorms are expected to diminish Thursday evening. Overall gusty winds are expected Thursday across much of Nevada. Blowing dust generated across western Nevada could reach into central and portions of northeastern Nevada Thursday afternoon and evening. Reduced visibility will be the primary impact so use caution when driving. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
